countryInputHint: Start typing a country, then choose from the list.
directorCorrespondenceAddressHint: We'll use this address to send Companies House mail to the director. You can use a business or home address and it does not have to be in the UK.
directorCorrespondenceAddressInsetHint: We will show this address on the public Companies House register.
directorCorrespondenceAddressAccordionTi: My correspondence address is the same as my home address
directorCorrespondenceAddressAccordionTe: We will not show your home address on the public register. However, if you use your home address as your correspondence address, we will show this on the public register.
directorCorrespondenceAddressAgentAccord: If you run your company from home and do not want your home address available to the public, there is a
list of agents who can provide registered office services (opens in new tab).
directorCorrespondenceAddressAgentOtherA: A quick online search will show other agents who offer similar services. All providers will charge a fee.
